newsitem.title: USA: PHLX to list three new options this week.
newsitem.headline: PHLX to list three new options this week.

text.p: The Philadelphia Stock Exchange (PHLX) said Monday it would list options on shares of First USA Paymentech Inc and Red Brick Systems Inc on April 16.
It also said it would begin trading options on Morrison Knudsen Corp on April 18.

For First USA Paymentech options, opening strike prices have been set at 20, 22-1/2 and 25, with initial expirations in May, June, September and December. Position limits have been set at 4,500 contracts.
Red Brick options would open with strikes of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2 and expirations in May, June, July and October. Position limits of 7,500 contracts have been set.
Options on Morrison Knudsen would have opening strike prices of 10, 12-1/2 and 15. Initial expirations are set for May, June, August and November. Position limits of 4,500 contracts have been set.

The PHLX said Group One Ltd is the specialist for First USA Paymentech options and LaSalle Trading for Red Brick options. Susquehanna Investment Group has been named specialist for Morrison Knudsen options, it said.
